name: Mole supervisor
description:
Type : Management game. With dwarves, beer, and gold.
Players : 1

In mole supervisor, you are the Dwarf supervisor of mining and gold's mole. Your master is sick, so you have to replace him!
You must bring beer to thirsty miners, and new pickaxes in case they broke theirs.
You can hire new miners to go faster. Just go at the bottom of the place you started, it costs 75 gold.
Beware of the goblins who live in the mines and will kill your miners if you don't find them first !
